mapper.insert: insert into notice (id, boardId, userId, createTime, lastUserId, lastTime, label, title, position, restricted, viewCount, updateCount, locked, hided, deleted, content ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{boardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{restricted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hided,jdbcType=BIT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update notice set boardId = #{boardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastUserId = #{lastUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lastTime = #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, restricted = #{restricted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, viewCount = #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updateCount = #{updateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=BIT}, hided = #{hided,jdbcType=BIT}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT n.id,n.createTime,n.lastTime,n.label,n.title,n.viewCount,a.username,b.lastEdit FROM notice n,(SELECT user.id,user.username FROM user) a,(SELECT user.id,user.username lastEdit FROM user) b WHERE n.userId=a.id AND n.hided=0 AND n.deleted=0 AND n.lastUserId=b.id ORDER BY n.position ASC,n.createTime DESC

SELECT n.id,n.createTime,n.lastTime,n.label,n.title,n.content,n.viewCount,n.deleted,a.username,b.lastEdit FROM notice n,(SELECT user.id,user.username FROM user) a,(SELECT user.id,user.username lastEdit FROM user) b WHERE n.id=#{id} AND n.hided=0 AND n.deleted=0 AND n.userId=a.id AND n.lastUserId=b.id
mapper.update: update notice set viewCount=viewCount+1 where id=#{id}
